Package com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes.helpers

Class MiniGamePlayerData

java.lang.Object
com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes.helpers.MiniGamePlayerData
All Implemented Interfaces:
MiniGameRankResult, Cloneable, Comparable<MiniGameRankResult>
public class MiniGamePlayerData extends Object implements MiniGameRankResult, Cloneable
Player data with score, live
[IMPORTANT] live is only valid in the minigame play (not related with player's health)
[IMPORTANT] Player state saved when a instance is created (in constructor)
